name: Detailers Kit
description:
Crazy strength, Bonkers shine, straight from the hip flask of a bearded detailing wizard!

1x Bottle mad*Cow LIME HAZE waterless wash wax system RRP£8.99
1x Bottle mad*Cow ULTRA VIOLET rapid gloss detailer RRP £6.99
2x Microfibre cloths

Everthing you need from car wash, car polish, carnauba wax protection right up to quick touch up shine.

...so what are you waiting for!

name: Ultra Violet Rapid Gloss Detailer
description:
Mad Cow ULTRA VIOLET....be prepared!

A ridiculously high gloss wax fortifying final coat. Can be applied over previous wax coating or straight into freshly cleaned paint work. Extremely high level of beading, long lasting protection. Easy buff low smear formula, can be used in direct sunlight. Spray on, wipe over, buff off! The ultimate show shine!

...so what are you waiting for!

name: Leather Dye Stain
description:
60ml mad*Cow Leather Dye Paint, specially formulated to renew, restore and re-coat your leather. 

This is a pigment Dye and Sealant all in one product, to freshen up tired leather or to fully change the final colour...this is the product for you!

Easy application, Brush, Roller, Spray whichever suits you.

Quick dry formula, beautiful satin finish which is smooth to the touch. 

Suitable on all leather material, faux leather, aniline,  also PVC. Not suitable for suede or faux suede. 60ml coverage 700 cm sq

Choose from our exclusive range of 21 colours, 14 classic tones, 4 primary, 3 'wow' colours we dare you to use for that unique piece of showroom furniture!

...so what are you waiting for!

name: Tyre wall paint White
description:
the mad*Cow Tyre Wall Paint-White has been specially formulated to provide a decorative White finish on your vehicles tyre side walls, mud flaps and other rubber components.

*Designed to remain permanently

*Soft and flexible so that it flexes with the tyre wall

*250ml enough to treat all four tyres with plenty spare

name: Waterless Wash Wax KIT
description:
Mad cow waterless wash wax 1 ltr kit

The easiest and fastest way to clean, shine & protect your car in under 30 minutes! Suitable for all paintwork, glass, rubber, plastic and all wheels. Simply spray on, wipe over, buff off. (Microfibre cloths always recommended). 

Extremely unique blend of products in the mad cow formula, strong dirt lifting agents do the dirty work, fine polishing compounds for the shiny work, supremely durable White Brazilian carnauba to give maximum protection and mesmerising water beading. 

Ideal winter protection from harsh weather ahead, great winter gift too!

1 ltr will wash approx 15 medium size cars. Also saving over 6000 litres of water

name: Carnauba Wax Liquid Sealant
description:
The ultimate in wax protection for your paintwork. Speed is king with this product, wax on wax off within a minute leaving behind an extreme shine with depth and enough protection for a British winter! 

Makes a great winter gift!!

250ml, enough for 4-6 applications on a medium sized car.

name: Whitewall Sealant
description:
mad*Cow Tyre Wall Wax Dressing

Enriched with a High grade content of White Carnauba Wax. This will maintain the slick appearance of your classic, Hot Rod, Rat Rod, Low Rider trucks Whitewall Tyres.
Wipe on and buff, wait 30 seconds, buff away. This agent will cleanse and protect all in one. 

It will greatly increase the life cycle of any Whitewalls whilst making the most of the poor weather we have in the UK.

...so what are you waiting for!

name: Cherry Berry Bomb
description:
This does exactly as it promises, De-Odorises and Freshens Fabrics, Upholstery & Carpets on a new level.

Easy mist spray atomiser bottle. One pass will release any foul and nasty odours immediately leaving Strong Cherry Freshness.
No hassle, No rubbing or soaking, just spray and run! Cherry Berry Perfume


...so what are you waiting for!

name: Tea Tree Leather Feeder
description:
mad*Cow Leather products do not contain harmful acids or suffocating silicones. Only sensitive ingredients selected to aid the lifespan of your leather. This product will clean, feed & condition your leather so not only is it healthy for your leather, it also leaves a beautifully natural feel and aroma. 

Prices starting at £3.80 this is a must have.

Ideal for all leathers. Jackets, boots, bags, sofa & armchairs. 100% guaranteed not to damage any leather, 100% customer satisfaction with this super product.

Also available in our new 'butter' form. Thicker in consistency, enables you to rub into the leather for a deeper feed.

...so what are you waiting for!

name: Crystal Glass
description:
This does exactly as it promises, Cleans Glass to a Crystal reflection level.

Easy mist spray on & wipe over formula. One pass will release any muck & grime and will dry immediately leaving  streak free finish.
No hassle, No rubbing or Buffing, Crystal results!


...so what are you waiting for!

name: Super Slippy Shampoo
description:
mad*Cow SUPER SLIPPY SHAMPOO 250ml

pH Neutral Acid Free Formula

Super Slippy glides effortlessly across your paintwork comfortably lifting away dirt and grit with its powerful surfactants, making a necessary job easy!

Super Slippy being pH Neutral will not strip away any wax layer applied, but will remove all contaminants to leave your paintwork looking wet and glossy. 

High Concentrate, one cap per 5 litres of water. Instructions included on product label.

...so what are you waiting for!

name: mad*Cow 'Jaffa Wax' 100g
description:
The ultimate wax for quick use!

Super Soft formula, easy to apply by hand. We really do mean BY HAND!

Only natural oils are used in 'Jaffa Wax' no silicone.

This is the future of fast wax application, ideal for wheels, chrome, plastic and all painted panels & bodywork. Extremely easy and soft to buff away once dry, this is not intended as a detailers wax - but for those who wish to make their car gleam at a comfortable price and speed.

For the next step up try mad*Cow 'Slick66' Carnauba Wax

name: Tyre Wall White Masking Tape
description:
Masking Tape for Curves.

Ideal for masking off your tyre walls prior to painting with mad*Cow Tyre Wall Paint. You can stretch, curve, bend, arc this tape with ease.
It's made like a bandage so is extremely flexible and easy to use, very good adhesive helps to keep in place whilst you plot your next curve.

19mm width on a 25mt roll.

This listing is for the masking tape only, if you wish to purchase mad*Cow Tyre Wall Paint please add this to your basket, visit our shop to add the paint too, postage will be combined for the two!

...so what are you waiting for!

name: 100gm Clay Bar
description: 100gm pro grade clay bar. For use with any clay lubricant or speed detailer.

name: Tyre Wall Degreaser
description:
This is mad*Cow Tyre Wall Degreaser 250ml

This is needed to be able to paint your tyre walls with mad*Cow Tyre Wall Paint, also mad*Cow Lettering Paint.

Without a thorough Degreasing your tyre surface will not allow for any coating to adhere to it. We cannot stress enough the need for this process of preparation. We do supply kits which contain this product with them, but for those of you looking for a high quality & strong preparation fluid for any tyre wall paint we always recommend our own as it is proven to work time and time again.

If purchased with another product from our shop we can combine postage.

...so what are you waiting for!

description:

*1x 250ml Super Strength mad*Cow Hood Cleaner

*1x Atomiser Spray Bottle mad*Cow Hood Sealant

*1x Coarse  Sponge Agitator

...so what are you waiting for!

description:

*1x Clay Bar 100gm

*1x Micro-fibre Cloth 400gsm

*1x 500ml mad*Cow Quick Detailer Gloss Enhancer & Clay Lubricant

*1x 250ml mad*Cow Cleaner Wax Carnauba Sealant

*Full instructions included

...so what are you waiting for!

description:
mad*Cow Leather Dye Paint, specially formulated to renew, restore and re-coat your leather. 

This is a pigment Dye and Sealant all in one product, to freshen up tired leather or to fully change the final colour...this is the product for you!

Easy application, Brush, Roller, Spray whichever suits you.

Quick dry formula, beautiful satin finish which is smooth to the touch. 

Suitable on all leather material, faux leather, aniline,  also PVC. Not suitable for suede or faux suede. 250ml coverage 4 mt sq

Choose from our exclusive range of 21 colours, 14 classic tones, 4 primary, 3 'wow' colours we dare you to use for that unique piece of showroom furniture!

PLEASE SPECIFY COLOUR UPON CHECKOUT ** Thank You!

name: Tyre Lettering Paint
description:
mad*Cow Lettering Paint White 250ml 

Note: This is a Permanent Paint = not a tip-ex pen that fades away within a week!

Stays white longer, extremely flexible to help with it's day to day job flexing with a rubber tyre wall, Quick Drying, Strong pigmentation to help define a finer lettering line. This is the proper stuff! 

We always recommend our mad*Cow Tyre Wall Degreaser is used prior to application, paint adhesion is totally dependant on the tyre wall being grease free.

Colours Available, WHITE, YELLOW, RED, BLUE, GREY, CREAM.
Please specify Colour upon checkout ** Thank You.

...so what are you waiting for!

name: mad*Cow 'Slick66' Carnauba Wax 250ml
description:
The Ultimate Wax!
Incredible deep gloss protection
Easy application
Combines pure North Brazilian carnauba wax with natural, luxury oils. 
Incredible water beading formula
Exceptionally resistant to road salts, UV light, acid rain and industrial fallout
Abrasive free
Suitable on all paint types and colours
Introducing the ultimate 66% carnauba hard wax. We've got everything you need to create a perfectly protective, concours finish. Welcome to the future.
Formulated from the finest blend of ingredients that includes a high concentration of pure North Brazilian carnauba wax and natural, luxury oils, mad*Cow 'Slick66' changes the rules of deep gloss protection. Be prepared for an incredible shine.
Despite its high percentage of carnauba wax, 'Slick66' is unbelievably easy to apply and buff to reveal an unrivalled, deep gloss shine and protective, concours finish.
'totes wax' is our most technically advanced wax to date, and it achieves an excellent hydrophobic finish which is exceptionally resistant to road salts, UV light, acid rain and industrial fallout.

name: Leather Painting Kit

Our pigment is so strong that you can completely renew your leather just the colour you want it. 

Any colour available. Please contact us via email mad.cow@mail.com

This kit will cover 5 metre square.
